title: When no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description: When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed and accessing a URL, it returns an HTTP code 200 OK with no content instead of the expected HTTP error 404.
OB: When no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404.
EB: When no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL should return an HTTP error 404 instead of 200 OK with no content.
SR: The issue should be resolved so that when no webapps are deployed, accessing a URL returns the appropriate HTTP error 404.
